form.name: name
form.data: Akash is a skilled IT engineer currently contributing as a front-end developer at Infosys. With a strong background in information technology, he adeptly utilizes his expertise to craft engaging and user-friendly interfaces. Akash is passionate about staying at the forefront of technological advancements, ensuring innovative and efficient solutions for web development projects. His commitment to excellence and continuous learning makes him a valuable asset in delivering high-quality front-end solutions at Infosys.
